item.title: Azure Function Triggered by Azure Event Grid
item.description: Update: I missed the elephant in the room. There actually exists a specialized trigger for Event Grid binding. In the portal, just select Experimental in Scenario drop down while creating the function. In precompiled functions, reference Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.EventGrid NuGet package.
